LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="c5ace91e4fb14c59b3966b6564b24ba2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thanks for the sweet rescue![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c5ace91e4fb14c59b3966b6564b24ba2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I'm a general contractor over at Moyama
Construction.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The name's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf02"/]Corgwin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c5ace91e4fb14c59b3966b6564b24ba2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Just like rescuing folks,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] construction is all
about using your imagination and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Dandori[System:Color name="Default"]
powers to get the job done.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Menu_Unlocked_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="e22e8b54f4d44f25bdd437a8ac09c9ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I was thinking you and I could join forces
and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]train for Dandori Battles [System:Color name="Default"]together.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Let's get those imaginative juices flowing!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="f86fc78bc2e045c6abff8dd018e4db8d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]Now we're talking![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f86fc78bc2e045c6abff8dd018e4db8d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Plus,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if we do this,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there's a super-sweet
reward in it for you.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Intro_PreQuest_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="a435d241bd394916947b79461370b9e1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]In the mood to train for a Dandori Battle?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'll accept your challenge anytime!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="c91b42a43e0344c3b45cad38508ef474" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Here we go! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I hope you're ready for one of
my famous [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf02"/]Corgwin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] challenges!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Continue_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="4e74c08e39e54f718931fd8a3687bd7d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Your time is limited,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so think it through!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Return_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="8f68c66038784c74a1eda38442b393d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Hey, you![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was way impressed with your
Dandori powers.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01: [Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="a18ce709cc814d9c93ffea3c05dd3d98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] All set for now?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] see you later.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="97eb3991043d4d9bbc1c81760e7a7676" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]It's no big thing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but can we just talk
about how we look exactly the same?!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="86d0a093562f46b8a2ef888ba84f7bba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my journey to becoming a
master craftsman started when I made
my first doghouse. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I was just a kid!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="18f6b9bdaafc4980a9be170ab7de9045" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Just by looking into your eyes,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can tell
you really believe in your partner.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="4becbf59733e414c96d7dcb477c7bf60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Whoa! Nice work! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]You did it! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Nothing
stands in your way, does it?
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="4fc1db43c6fa407f8ad2bdb680d5989c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]While watching your Dandori skills in
action,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I knew I had a friend for life![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4fc1db43c6fa407f8ad2bdb680d5989c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]We definitely gotta keep this up!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="2cf8c3c61de94ca8b424775a8e364188" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Interesting, interesting...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Your Dandori
skills are becoming second nature!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02: [Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="894f4028c46a4eb1a3a96950d13c2500" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Welp, there you go![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You earned it.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="b5501aa6d99746faacd5e610fe54156e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Seriously?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're already a
Dandori master?!

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="10e94348e78d4d459c62f2984827abee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Impressive, indeed![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Please accept that
token of thanks![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="10e94348e78d4d459c62f2984827abee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]But back to the reason you're here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Let's train those Dandori muscles!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="c927caa25dd6473d878d5eb580ec670c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Hey there![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The results you've had in
Dandori Battles are nothing to scoff
at.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Way to go!

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="68b8892b7f51435d83ece1daa2dcdde8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]There's a little something just for you![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="68b8892b7f51435d83ece1daa2dcdde8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]But back to the reason you're here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Let's train those Dandori muscles!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="c39989f0318642199ac35f9c4161d47f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Your Dandori abilities really are something
else.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now I'm the one who has to keep up
with you!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="048f99b1abce49fb82ca19b045ae6343" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It's way important to have that desire
to improve yourself. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]And that applies to
more than just the art of Dandori!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="985f9b7d077c464985e7108fb04eca5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I got a lot of hard work waiting for me
when I get home. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Houses don't build
themselves, do they!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="845aa0bd329049a983c0a22d2c162626" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I gotta keep working on my Dandori skills
so I don't fall behind you and Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="309e527af341461c923dbfc927b0e067" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Huh, looks like a lot of people have started
coming to this planet. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]I had a hunch that
would happen...
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="34c3a889ecca49c1a5a52d176e664ddf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]In my work as a general contractor,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I need to know what people are really
thinking just by looking into their eyes.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="34c3a889ecca49c1a5a52d176e664ddf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]That's 'cause not every customer knows
how to express their deepest thoughts
and desires through words.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="34c3a889ecca49c1a5a52d176e664ddf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]It's not every day someone gets to move
into a brand-new house,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so you want it to
check every one of their boxes.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="b596e004e0824888bce3d0fe2c0f2bb2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Are you asking me why a general
contractor like me needs to have
amazing Dandori powers?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b596e004e0824888bce3d0fe2c0f2bb2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Isn't it obvious?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b596e004e0824888bce3d0fe2c0f2bb2" Scale="1"/]Think of it this way. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]You wouldn't ask a
professional plumber to start framing up
your house, right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b596e004e0824888bce3d0fe2c0f2bb2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]A general contractor learns who is good at
which tasks and delegates the work
appropriately.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's not easy.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="e84b19cf7d0e44a0a40b847bed0292cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I was watching the news one night and
saw that this new planet was out there.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e84b19cf7d0e44a0a40b847bed0292cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I had a feeling a lot of folks would try to
move here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I grabbed all my tools and
did the same thing.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e84b19cf7d0e44a0a40b847bed0292cf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Too bad I lost every last one of those
tools when I got stranded![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Still not over it.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="0d83609d1dcb4723a31fc6fc5cc838fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]A big part of a general contractor's job is
to keep an eye on folks. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Make sure they
aren't in trouble or need something to do.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d83609d1dcb4723a31fc6fc5cc838fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Tiny delays can snowball faster than you'd
think. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]You gotta stay on top of things![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d83609d1dcb4723a31fc6fc5cc838fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]In the end, it's about the customers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
They're the ones waiting for their
houses,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and we can't let them down.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="fca47b357c34414bb3c0dcdc22687488" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]What was it like being a leafling?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fca47b357c34414bb3c0dcdc22687488" Scale="1"/]My mind was consumed by thoughts of
how to better manage job sites,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] improve
worker efficiency,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] give better direction...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fca47b357c34414bb3c0dcdc22687488" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]All I thought about was planning.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] First
I'd plan one thing, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]then another. It was
nonstop![etc:Wait frame="15"/] And exhausting.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I needed a break!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_00_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="a7c55f1412b9404cbf9d7b1e96d84607" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]No way![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Not a smart move, buddy.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a7c55f1412b9404cbf9d7b1e96d84607" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]You don't know the first thing about
the art of Dandori. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Come back when
you're ready.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="7ac8356a6e0440c09412c7de62c2a8af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]I've basically been a master builder since
the day I was born.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Bring it on!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="87a20ee55ef24a5b89e201d2c61f3a4f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]In the mood to train for a Dandori Battle?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'll accept your challenge anytime!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="5edb6ac94b2142cc8e25b56cd2b5de73" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]In my work as a general contractor,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I need to know what people are really
thinking just by looking into their eyes.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5edb6ac94b2142cc8e25b56cd2b5de73" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]That's 'cause not every customer knows
how to express their deepest thoughts
and desires through words.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5edb6ac94b2142cc8e25b56cd2b5de73" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]It's not every day someone gets to move
into a brand-new house,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so you want it to
check every one of their boxes.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="5f029f514b074c13aaba4d104170f0d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Are you asking me why a general
contractor like me needs to have
amazing Dandori powers?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5f029f514b074c13aaba4d104170f0d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Isn't it obvious?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5f029f514b074c13aaba4d104170f0d6" Scale="1"/]Think of it this way. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]You wouldn't ask a
professional plumber to start framing up
your house, right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5f029f514b074c13aaba4d104170f0d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]A general contractor learns who is good at
which tasks and delegates the work
appropriately.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's not easy.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="fdb84d8c048f46a1b367058a6745e5e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I was stranded when I first saw the
leaflings...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I looked closely at one of them,
and their eyes were full of sadness.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="ba1105f2e47646c2a3b91ce82fbcfc11" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Sweet![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You ready to go?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's Dandori
Battle time, baby!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="b0ea93c3229d4fe29902501ad578e5cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I was watching the news one night and
saw that this new planet was out there.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b0ea93c3229d4fe29902501ad578e5cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I had a feeling a lot of folks would try to
move here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I grabbed all my tools and
did the same thing.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b0ea93c3229d4fe29902501ad578e5cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Too bad I lost every last one of those
tools when I got stranded![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Still not over it.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="0af277c235084ece85e5cd20f073f216" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I was attacked by a creature,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and right
before I lost consciousness,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I saw
something overhead.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was a leafling.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0af277c235084ece85e5cd20f073f216" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]They had such sad eyes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but there was
more going on in there.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Their eyes were
full of determination.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0af277c235084ece85e5cd20f073f216" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I have to believe there is a reason why
they do what they do.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Turning castaways
into leaflings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I mean.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="e35b0085af1a494cbac33d082764bcd7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I can see in your eyes that you're
looking for a challenge.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e35b0085af1a494cbac33d082764bcd7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Good![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Then let's get started![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You'll be a
Dandori Battle pro before you know it!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="6caed7e8eaa54e4ca4c49acab5b9d499" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Dandori Battles are truly fascinating![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
After watching a few, I got totally hooked!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="0e4ee89a8b554adcafb76299c82b220a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]A big part of a general contractor's job is
to keep an eye on folks. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Make sure they
aren't in trouble or need something to do.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0e4ee89a8b554adcafb76299c82b220a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Tiny delays can snowball faster than you'd
think. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]You gotta stay on top of things![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0e4ee89a8b554adcafb76299c82b220a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]In the end, it's about the customers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
They're the ones waiting for their
houses,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and we can't let them down.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="15b5049498a44c9392e99a9913af6a67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]What was it like being a leafling?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15b5049498a44c9392e99a9913af6a67" Scale="1"/]My mind was consumed by thoughts of
how to better manage job sites,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] improve
worker efficiency,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] give better direction...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15b5049498a44c9392e99a9913af6a67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]All I thought about was planning.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] First
I'd plan one thing, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]then another. It was
nonstop![etc:Wait frame="15"/] And exhausting.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I needed a break!
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_04_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="73858e32a5ad4f8a9d31140f49de1d29" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I could tell just by looking at you that your
Dandori abilities would be extraordinary.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="12b598a11d4f43a3b86cc7285c84c09f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You've come so far! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]You know I'll help you
with your training as much as you want.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="879676220d094df0b5df949c50a843ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You've got a good head on your shoulders.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I can tell you've started to appreciate all
the joy the art of Dandori has to offer.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="879676220d094df0b5df949c50a843ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Keep up the good work! And don't forget
to get your hands dirty too...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]while keeping
an eye on the big picture, of course.
LF001.LF001_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="9b68309f5bd94aa491f4382b3029aa2c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Your planning abilities are amazing![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
If you're ever in need of a job, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]be sure
to look me up. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]I'd be happy to take you on!
